byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: Omnibus bands of music are parading our streets in all directions, drumming up for Whig, Native, and Locofoco meetings to-night. Politics are hotter now than they were in 1848. I have great hopes that Gov. JOHNSTON will be re-elected. His success depends upon Philadelphia city and county.
